name: Illithilich
damage_immunities: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day).
descriptions: If the illithilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Rejuvenation.
descriptions: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed illithilich gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The illithilich is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). The lich has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: * Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost
descriptions.hyperlinked: * Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost

descriptions.raw: * 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, magic missile, shield, thunderwave
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, magic missile, shield, thunderwave

descriptions.raw: * 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, invisibility, Melf's acid arrow, mirror image
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, invisibility, Melf's acid arrow, mirror image

descriptions.raw: * 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, counterspell, dispel magic, fireball
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, counterspell, dispel magic, fireball

descriptions.raw: * 6th level (1 slot): disintegrate, globe of invulnerability
* 7th level (1 slot): finger of death, plane shift
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 7th level (1 slot): finger of death, plane shift

descriptions.raw: * 8th level (1 slot): dominate monster, power word stun
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 8th level (1 slot): dominate monster, power word stun

special_abilities.name: Turn Resistance.
descriptions: The illithilich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
descriptions: The illithilich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics).
descriptions: The illithilich's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 20). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components.

descriptions.raw: 1/day each: dominate monster, plane shift (self only)
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1/day each: dominate monster, plane shift (self only)

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch.
descriptions: Melee Spell Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (3d6) cold damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Tentacles.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 21 (3d10+5) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 15) and must succeed on a DC 20 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the lich. Hit: 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the lich kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6).
descriptions: The illithilich magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence saving throw or take 27 (5d8+5) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary_action_description: The illithilich can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. The illithilich regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Tentacles.
descriptions: The illithilich makes one attack with its tentacles.

legendary_actions.name: Mind Blast (Costs 3 Actions).
descriptions: The illithilich recharges its Mind Blast and uses it.

legendary_actions.name: Cast Spell (Costs 1-3 Actions).
descriptions: The illithilich uses a spell slot to cast a 1st-, 2nd-, or 3rd-level spell that it has prepared. Doing so costs 1 legendary action per level of the spell.
